title: Color ID
content:
Can you ID the 4811 Chippendale Font. I know the last line (galen) is Futura.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014638im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/color_4139.png)

 [‹ Typesetting question - beyond the ellipsis](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014638/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35970 "Go to previous forum topic") [Books on information design ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014638/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36009 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zzi

comments.content: [Geometric 415](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014638/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/geometric_415_medium/?sample_text=4811%20Chippendale&sample_size=45). Linotype’s [Metromedium](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014638/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/metromedium_no_2/?sample_text=4811%20Chippendale&sample_size=44) is a slightly different digitization, more true to [Dwiggins](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104014638/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/William%252BAddison%252BDwiggins)’ original.
